## General

* Data [download site](https://datadryad.org/resource/doi:10.5061/dryad.8rr0498)
* Collision and McCormick Place night-time lighting data were by recorded by researchers during "pre-dawn walks." 
* The McCormick Place light score is the number of window bays illuminated. There are 17 total window bays.
* There is collision data for both McCormick Place (a convention center in Chicago) and downtown Chicago. There is only lighting data for McCormick Place. 

## Key variables

* Bird taxonomy
  * `family`
  * `genus`
  * `species`
* Collisions
  * `date`
  * `light_score`
